title: Basic Life Support Education: Mobile-Based Contextual Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic life support (BLS) concepts and experience in administering emergency care in medical settings
context.additional_context: Customized mobile learning environment for in-service healthcare professionals, enhancing asynchronous self-directed learning via an Android-based application (SBVida)

learning_goals: Learners can confirm patient responsiveness and perform 119 emergency reporting procedures within 10 seconds of cardiac arrest
Learners acquire skills to perform high-quality chest compressions within 2 minutes through scenario-based animations
Learners can explain AED usage with 90% accuracy using simulation modules in mobile applications
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
